newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philex says posts Q4 96 pre-tax net loss.
newsitem.headline: Philex says posts Q4 96 pre-tax net loss.

text.p: Philex Mining Corp said it posted a net loss of 80.679 million pesos before income tax in the fourth quarter of 1996.
In an unaudited statement of income submitted to the Philippine Stock Exchange on Tuesday, the mining firm said that its net operating income for the quarter amounted to 533.70 million pesos.
But total cost of sales was 552.56 million pesos while other charges for the period amounted to 61.83 million pesos.
As of end-1996, the company said its total assets amounted 7.618 billion pesos.
It did not give comparative figures.
